title: IGH Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for the 25 Senior Resident Posts
description: Indira Gandhi Hospital Delhi (IGH Delhi) has declared the official notification fr 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 25 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma, MD/ MS, and DNB can grab this chance and apply for the IGH Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirants can attend the interview at the address given below...
